interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Greatest American Hero - The Complete Series (Free Cape and Notebook Included) [DVD]
Review Date: 2008/01/01
Store: William Katt  (Actor),     Connie Sellecca  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy
Product Description: ['Believe it or not, he\x92s walking on air! William Katt stars as mild-mannered high school teacher Ralph Hinkley, whose close encounter with aliens leaves him with a red super-power suit that only he can control. But when Ralph promptly loses the instruction manual, the safety of mankind is left in his fumbling hands. Now with the help of his attorney girlfriend Pam Davidson (Connie Selleca) and FBI agent Bill Maxwell (Robert Culp), the world\x92s most unlikely flying crime fighter is ready for action. Who could it be? Believe it or not, he\x92s THE GREATEST AMERICAN HERO! Michael Pare and Faye Grant co-star in this awesome \x9180s hit created by Stephen J. Cannell that featured such guest stars as Joe Mantegna, Markie Post, Bob Saget, Rick Dees, June Lockhart, David Paymer, Barbara Hale, André The Giant, Dixie Carter, Don Drysdale and more. This deluxe set also includes interviews, with cast and crew, and the unaired spinoff series pilot "The Greatest American Heroine".']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Format': "Box set, Color, DVD, Full Screen, Collector's Edition, NTSC", 'Contributor': 'William Bogert, Jeff Ray, Jesse D. Goins, Glenn R. Wilder, Don Cervantes, Robert Culp, Edward Bell, William Katt, Connie Sellecca, Michael Par, Stephen J. Cannell, Faye Grant, Robby Weaver, Brandon WilliamsWilliam Bogert, Jeff Ray, Jesse D. Goins, Glenn R. Wilder, Don Cervantes, Robert Culp, Edward Bell, William Katt, Connie Sellecca, Michael Par, Stephen J. Cannell, Faye Grant, Robby Weaver, Brandon Williams  See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Number Of Discs': '13', 'Runtime': '35 hours and 22 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 5 x 4.75 inches; 3.4 Pounds', 'Media Format': "Box set, Color, DVD, Full Screen, Collector's Edition, NTSC", 'Run time': '35 hours and 22 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 3, 2006', 'Actors': 'William Katt, Connie Sellecca, Robert Culp, Don Cervantes, Faye Grant', 'Studio': 'Starz / Anchor Bay', 'Writers': 'Jeff Ray, Stephen J. Cannell', 'Number of discs': '13'}
Review Text: i bought this for my brother for christmas, since we have such fond memories of it as kids. christmas day he calls and says that he and his girlfriend are flying around their apartment with the cape on. they love the instruction manual and aparently there is some episode of a attempted greatest american heroine...but didnt make it. he is normally someone who doesnt open collector things so i was shocked when i found he had. he said he couldnt help himself. anyway, excellent product.
Review Title: instant hero
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

The Greatest American Hero - The Complete Series (Free Cape and Notebook Included) [DVD]
William Katt  (Actor),     Connie Sellecca  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy
['Believe it or not, he\x92s walking on air! William Katt stars as mild-mannered high school teacher Ralph Hinkley, whose close encounter with aliens leaves him with a red super-power suit that only he can control. But when Ralph promptly loses the instruction manual, the safety of mankind is left in his fumbling hands. Now with the help of his attorney girlfriend Pam Davidson (Connie Selleca) and FBI agent Bill Maxwell (Robert Culp), the world\x92s most unlikely flying crime fighter is ready for action. Who could it be? Believe it or not, he\x92s THE GREATEST AMERICAN HERO! Michael Pare and Faye Grant co-star in this awesome \x9180s hit created by Stephen J. Cannell that featured such guest stars as Joe Mantegna, Markie Post, Bob Saget, Rick Dees, June Lockhart, David Paymer, Barbara Hale, André The Giant, Dixie Carter, Don Drysdale and more. This deluxe set also includes interviews, with cast and crew, and the unaired spinoff series pilot "The Greatest American Heroine".']

profile:
The user exhibits a strong affinity for nostalgic and comedic television series, particularly those that elicit fond childhood memories. Key preferences include:

- **Nostalgia**: The purchase was motivated by positive childhood experiences associated with the series, indicating a tendency to value sentimental connections with media.
- **Family Connections**: The user enjoys sharing entertainment experiences with family, as seen by purchasing this product as a Christmas gift for a brother, suggesting an emphasis on familial bonding through shared media.
- **Collector’s Editions**: The choice of a boxed set highlights an appreciation for collector’s items and the desire to own complete series in high-quality formats.
- **Humor and Light-heartedness**: The interest in a comedy series suggests a preference for light-hearted entertainment that provides enjoyment and amusement.
- **Interactive Elements**: The mention of an instruction manual and its engaging use indicates a liking for interactive or involved aspects of media experiences.

Overall, the user values nostalgic, comedic content that fosters family connections and appreciates the special features that come with collector's editions.
